content.raw:
Some `ign-gui` tests are failing due to display issues, do you have an idea of what could be causing it?

~~~
13: QStandardPaths: XDG_RUNTIME_DIR not set, defaulting to '/tmp/runtime-root'
13: qt.qpa.screen: QXcbConnection: Could not connect to display unix:99
13: Could not connect to any X display.
~~~
content.html:
Some ign-gui tests are failing due to display issues, do you have an idea of what could be causing it?

13: QStandardPaths: XDG_RUNTIME_DIR not set, defaulting to '/tmp/runtime-root'
13: qt.qpa.screen: QXcbConnection: Could not connect to display unix:99
13: Could not connect to any X display.
